channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI CTO Mira Murati Is Leaving the Company
item.description: In a letter to the OpenAI team posted on X, Murati wrote that “this moment feels right” to step down.

item.title: Marvel Fusion lands $70M for laser-powered fusion bet
item.description: Marvel Fusion is one of several companies pursuing what’s known as inertial confinement fusion. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal u...

item.title: Soon After the Deadly Hezbollah Pager Explosions, This AI-Generated Podcast Went Up
item.description: The Pager Protocol podcast went up hours after exploding pagers and two-way radios killed dozens and injured hundreds in Lebanon last week. How did it...

item.title: OpenAI’s chief research officer has left following CTO Mira Murati’s exit
item.description: OpenAI’s chief research officer, Bob McGrew, and a research VP, Barret Zoph, left the company on Wednesday, hours after OpenAI CTO Mira Murati announc...

item.title: Peak XV has reaped $1.2B in the year since it split from Sequoia
item.description: Peak XV Partners, the largest India-focused venture fund, has realized about $1.2 billion in exits since it separated from Sequoia last year. © 2024 T...

item.title: WordPress.org bans WP Engine, blocks it from accessing its resources
item.description: WordPress drama went up another notch on Wednesday after WordPress.org banned hosting provider WP Engine from accessing its resources. © 2024 TechCrun...

item.title: Titan Submersible Hearings Spotlight Multiple Issues With Its Carbon Fiber Hull
item.description: Testimony identifies manufacturing defects and problems following an earlier dive and reveals that OceanGate conducted no testing or remedial work des...

item.title: Pilots Are Dying of Tiredness. Tech Can’t Save Them
item.description: Extended hours after the pandemic have put pressure on pilots in India, who are working longer hours without rest, but monitoring technology to help c...

item.title: Meta Missed Out on Smartphones. Can Smart Glasses Make Up for It?
item.description: At Meta’s Connect developer conference, CEO Mark Zuckerberg showed off Orion, a futuristic pair of smart glasses that the company hopes will lead the ...

item.title: Dinii, a cloud-based restaurant management platform, raises $45M Series B
